gamerpower.title: World of Warships 10th Anniversary Pack Giveaway
gamerpower.description:
Celebrate World of Warships’ 10th Anniversary! If you’re a new player, you can unlock a bunch of goodies. If you’re a current player, there’s some stuff for you too!

New Player Rewards:
- 20 Days Premium Account Time
- Japanese Tier III cruiser Tenryū
- Port slot & Commander

Anniversary Battle Missions (New and current players):
*Complete all missions to unlock 
- U.S. Tier VII cruiser Boise
- 7x Supercontainers
- 40,000,000 Credits
- 1,000,000 Elite Commander XP
- 600,000 Free XP
- 25x rare expendable economic bonuses of each type
gamerpower.instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Click the "Play on PC" Button
3. Select either the 'Create Account' or 'Already have an account'
4. If you are a new player, enter the required information in the field.
5. The reward should be added automatically if you followed our link.
6. Optionally, complete the Anniversary Battle Missions for more rewards.
